snippet: Two dissimilar founders of the N.A.A.C.P. collaborate in “Dr. Du Bois and Miss Ovington,” from Woodie King Jr.’s New Federal Theater.
abstract: Anita Gates reviews New Federal Theater production of Clare Coss play Dr Du Bois and Miss Ovington, directed by Gabrielle L Kurlander and starring Kathleen Chalfant at Castillo Theater.
lead_paragraph: Two dissimilar founders of the N.A.A.C.P. collaborate in “Dr. Du Bois and Miss Ovington,” from Woodie King Jr.’s New Federal Theater.
